This is a small not-memory-resistant utility which gives basic functionality well known on other mobile platforms - it will increase your ringing or alarm volume gradually to some predefined level. \nIt\'s very suitable if you are used to lower the ringing volume at quiet places, but you forget to switch it back when you leave - an action that results in many missed calls. \nAnother useful feature is this that you can turn off the vibration option in the phone\'s settings and adjust the program to start it at specific volume level while it's increasingly ringing.
